articles.title: Manchester United investigating how Galatasaray fans had Old Trafford home tickets - The Athletic
articles.description:
Manchester United are investigating after a number of Galatasaray fans appeared to have tickets in the home section of Old Trafford during their Champions League game on Tuesday.
